property.name: stormsd.zookeeper.port
property.description: The port Storm will use to connect to each of the ZooKeeper servers.

property.name: stormsd.nimbus.childopts
property.description: This parameter is used by the storm-deploy project to configure the jvm options for the nimbus daemon.

property.name: stormsd.ui.port
property.description: Storm UI binds to this port.

property.name: stormsd.ui.childopts
property.description: Childopts for Storm UI Java process.

property.name: stormsd.supervisor.slots.ports
property.description: A list of ports that can run workers on this supervisor. Each worker uses one port, and the supervisor will only run one worker per port. Use this configuration to tune how many workers run on each machine. Comma or space separated list, must start from 6700, and then usually add one slot per core.

property.name: stormsd.supervisor.childopts
property.description: This parameter is used by the storm-deploy project to configure the jvm options for the supervisor daemon.

property.name: stormsd.worker.childopts
property.description: The jvm opts provided to workers launched by this supervisor. All \"%ID%\" substrings are replaced with an identifier for this worker.

property.name: stormsd.drpc.childopts
property.description: The jvm opts provided to workers launched by this supervisor. All \"%ID%\" substrings are replaced with an identifier for this worker.

property.name: stormsd.loglevel
property.description: Configure the storm logging level, by default WARN is used.

property.name: stormsd.logviewer.port
property.description: Storm log viewer binds to this port.

property.name: stormsd.logviewer.childopts
property.description: Default memory/HeapSize for the Java Virtual Machine.
